Guides¶

The goal of this page is to give you some concrete examples for using py_labeler. These are examples with sample data that is already bundled along with the package. The examples are in the form of Jupyter notebooks.

A Quick Tour of Jupyter Notebook¶

This tutorial gives a quick tour on installing and using Jupyter notebook.

Sampling and labeling¶

  • Sampling and labeling: Jupyter notebook

End-to-End EM Workflows¶

  • Refer to py_entitymatching for stepwise and end-to-end entity matching workflow guide: py_entitymatching guides
